text:
Wow, but still,
it's really starting, isn't it?

What's wrong? All of a sudden...
Something on your mind?

Not really, it's about the preparations for the debut live.
The concept we discussed together is taking shape...

The day we'll stand on stage will come eventually...
It just doesn't feel real yet.

Haha, I was actually joking...!
Don't worry, nothing like that.

No, strangely enough, it's the opposite.
The reality is more thrilling, isn't it?

It's natural to feel nervous about something new.
Things will gradually become real from now on, I'm sure.

Well, dreaming of the day we'll meet our idol
Let's do our best for now!

...And besides,
I don't want to cause any trouble for everyone!
